Question
========
Dunya expects the following: the linear relationship between depressive symptoms of mothers (sum scores on a questionnaire) and the temperament of their children (sum scores on a questionnaire) disappears when statistically controlling for the attachment relationship between mother and child (secure or insecure). Which model is most appropriate for testing this hypothesis? 

Answerlist
----------
* ANCOVA.
* Two-way ANOVA.
* Three-way ANOVA.
* Simple linear regression.
